field.displayname: Enable agent control of the recording
field.name: msdyn_agentrecordingcontrolsenabled

field.displayname: Enable agent control of the transcription
field.name: msdyn_agenttranscriptioncontrolsenabled

field.displayname: Enable agent control to add an external participant
field.name: msdyn_agentexternalparticipantcontrolenabled

field.displayname: Enable agent control to add an external participant on Teams
field.name: msdyn_agentexternalteamsparticipantcontrolenabled

field.displayname: Enable agent external participant transfer control for external Microsoft Teams users
field.name: msdyn_agentexternalteamsparticipanttransfercontrolenabled

field.displayname: Enable agent external participant transfer control for external phone numbers
field.name: msdyn_agentexternalparticipanttransfercontrolenabled

field.displayname: Enable bridged transfer for Microsoft Teams
field.name: msdyn_usebridgetransferforteamstransfer

field.displayname: Enable bridged transfer for public switched telephony network
field.name: msdyn_usebridgetransferforpstntransfer

field.displayname: Stop transcription and recording after Microsoft Teams transfer
field.name: msdyn_stoptranscriptionandrecordingafterteamstransfer

field.displayname: Stop transcription and recording after public switched telephone network transfer
field.name: msdyn_stoptranscriptionandrecordingafterpstntransfer

field.displayname: Skip wait music for workstream IVR
field.name: msdyn_skipwaitmusicforivr
